snippet: Europa Galante, a period-instrument ensemble, joined with the mezzo-soprano Vivica Genaux to consider Italian Baroque works on Thursday night at Zankel Hall.
abstract: Allan Kozinn reviews concert of Italian Baroque works performed by period-instrument ensemble Europa Galante, along with mezzo-soprano Vivica Genaux, at Zankel Hall.
lead_paragraph: Europa Galante, a period-instrument ensemble, joined with the mezzo-soprano Vivica Genaux to consider Italian Baroque works on Thursday night at Zankel Hall.

headline.main: Painting Baroque With a Refined Palette
headline.print_headline: Painting Baroque With a Refined Palette
